Terakhir, pagi harinya.. 
kita minta breakfast utk dikirim ke kamar dan DIKENAKAN CHARGE 15RIBU. 
INI SAYA TAMU HOTEL ANDA LOH YA. 
BUKAN TAMU LUAR, UNTUK BREAKFAST DEMI KEAMANAN DIRI SELAMA PANDEMI KAMI DIKENAKAN CHARGE LAGI?

text:
Lokasinya enak di deket stasiun gubeng. Saat check in prosesnya cepet dan mbaknya ramah. Pesan type kamar tertinggi, nyaman banget, ukurannya luas banget dan kamar mandinya ada bathupnya (dikasih bunga banyak banget). Trus in room breakfast nya super komplit, enak-enak banget.

Cobain dinner di The Gardener Resto lantai 1 interiornya kece banget, ala ala taman dengan banyak tamanan artificial, jadi serasa makan di tengah kebun.

Di lantai 11 ada rooftop barnya yang juga kece banget kalo sore menjelang malam, instagramable banget dan makanannya juga enak-enak. Oiya, di sebelah rooftop bar juga ada kolam renang dan diatasnya ada ayunannya, pemandangannya kece banget dah.

Menurutku recomended banget dah buat staycation, apalagi ratenya juga terjangkau
title: Hotel Nyaman dekat Stasiun Gubeng

text:
Pertama kalinya check in di g suites sambutan dari resepsionis terasa kurang welcome. Pada awalnya saya tidak melihat itu hal yang janggal dan memakluminya saja. Kamar yang single bed sudah abis padahal saya pesan via app itu langsung bayar dan terkonfirmasi untuk single bed tersedia. Akhirnya pasrah menggunakan kamar twin bed.

Saya pesan 1 kamar untuk 2 orang tetapi sikat gigi tersedia hanya untuk satu orang. Kamar mandinya kondisi lampu susah hidup. Shower harusnya diperbaiki karena kondisinya seperti mau copot kalau di puter-puter. Salah satu gelas nya kurang bersih seperti masih ada noda kopi yang tersisa.

Saat saya mengambil pesanan makanan di lobby, saya kembali menghampiri resepsionis. Yang kali ini dengan kondisi kesal karena kamar yang jauh dibawah standar. Sikap resepsionis rasanya memang kurang bagus. Saya bertanya untuk meminjam sendok tetapi diarahkan untuk pinjam saja ke resto. Oke tidak apa apa saya ambil saja sendiri. Tetapi di resto ketika saya bertanya untuk pinjam sendok, kata staf di resto ada charge yang harus saya bayar untuk meminjam sendok. Saya belum pernah sebelumnya kena charge untuk hanya meminjam sendok. Saya merasa jengkel karena pengalaman di hotel lain tidak pernah seburuk ini.

Karena banyak faktor buruk yang saya temui dengan berat hati saya perlu menulis review dengan rate bintang satu. Berharap besar G Suite kedepannya bisa mendengar keluhan pelanggan termasuk saya dan segera cepat memperbaiki pelayanan. Karena pelayanan yang saya temui cuman hal sepele yang kalau diabaikan bikin kesal pengunjung juga lho. Bisa jadi hal hal sepele aja tidak pernah diperhatikan, apalagi hal yang besar. Saya jadi sangat meragukan kualitas G Suites.
title: BAD SERVICE! BIKIN KAPOK BALIK

text: Benar-benar hotel yang tidak layak direkomendasikan. Memang gempatnya sangat strategis, namun, kesannya sudah usang. Karpet dalam lift sudah usang dan tua. Kamar yang saya pesan, 1 non smoning dan 1 smoking, namun keduanya diberi kamar SMOKING. buat saya tentu tidak nyaman karena masih bau rokok. Wifi memang cepat dan gratis, doorman ramah dan helpful, tetapi resepsionisnya perlu ditraining lagi. Masak saya sudah memesan 2 kamar suite masing-masing 2 hari, mau extend hingga jam 1 siang saja dikenakan charge 125 ribu. Duh, komersil sekali, tidak ada sedikitpun penghargaan kepada customer. Sarapan sangat standard dan tidak enak, tidak banyak variasi, nyesel saya nambah sarapan per orang 65rb, karuan makan diluar. Kamar saya di 1008, saat malam terdengar suara berisik dari atap, sepertinya suara air tandon dan sangat mengganggu istirahat. Saat saya datang, kamar 9008 airnya berbau dan saat dikeluarkan dalam bath tub berwarna kuning. Hingga kakak saya marah besar karena membookingkan hotel yang tidak beres. Overall, harga dan kualitas tidak sebanding,  TIDAK REKOMEN deh tinggal disini. Dengan hotel sebelahnya yang lebih bonafide cuma selisih 100 ribuan aja kok. Fasilitas whirpool rusak, jadi tidak ada keunggulannya.

text:
Saya check-in pada Jumat,24 Agustus 2018 sekitar pukul 12.30. Pada waktu check-in diinformasikan bahwa ketersediaan kamar Non-Smoking hanya TwinBed saja, sedangkan untuk Single Bed tersedia 1 di kamar Smoking.

Saya tidak keberatan selama kamar tidak berbau rokok, lalu petugas front desk berinisiatif memperlihatkan kamar terlebih dahulu apakah sesuai dengan toleransi saya atau tidak. Setelah di antar melihat kamar, saya tidak keberatan untuk menempati ruangan tersebut, karena tidak tercium bau rokok di dalam kamar dan barang yang saya titipkan di lobby pun di antar ke kamar selang beberapa waktu kemudian.

Karena saya harua mengejar waktu untuk meeting jadi saya sesegera bersiap dan meninggalkan kamar lagi. Sekembalinya untuk beristirahat saya terkejut dengan kondisi kebersihan kamar mandi. 
1. Terlihat sudut-sudut lantai dibawah wc kotor dan terlihat seperti tidak terjamah saat proses pembersihan kamar pada waktu tamu check out.
2. Shower yang terpasang pada langit-langit kamar mandi susah diatur sesuai dengan jenis semburan air yang dikehendaki pengguna.
3. Saluran pembuangan air dari area shower berjalan sangat lambat sehingga ketika saya mandi air menggenang hingga setinggi mata kaki, dan membutuhkan waktu sekitar 30 menit untuk surut.

Saya sempat melapor untuk diperiksa oleh teknisi, dan setelah dikunjungi oleh teknisi hasil analisanya menyebutkan bahwa saluran pembuangan air tersebut di kamar saya tidak bermasalah, dicurigai saluran air di bawah kamar saya yang menyebabkan hal semacam ini. 

Sempat terlihat lantai berona pink dibagian bawah soap dispenser, saya menganggap mungkin pernah bocor sehingga tetesan sabun yang mengering meninggalkan noda disana. Namun, keika tengah malam saya akan bersitirahat, saya mencuci kaki dan air yang mengalir dari shower tersebut menjadi berbusa dan lantai menjadi licin untuk membilas kaki sehingga rawan terpeleset.

Saya merasa kecewa, meskipun dalam kondisi tingkat okupensi yang tinggi sekalipun, mustinya kamar seperti ini tidak ditawarkan kepada tamu. Selain kebersihan dari pada kamar mandi yang kurang terjaga, namun juga beberapa fasilitas didalamnya perlu perbaikan.
title: Pemeliharaan Fasilitas Kamar yang Buruk

text:
G Suite Hotel Prime Location But.........

Saya cek in tanggal 13 Desember datang jam 14.30 resepsionis lelet. Bahkan saya mesti menunggu 30 menit hanya untuk masuk kamar. Dapat keycard tapi di lift tak bisa digunakan untung ada mas3 housekeeping yg bantu naik lift dan masuk kamar. Dan mas itu juga yang membantu saya mengembalikan keycard ke resepsionis.

REVIEW 
POSITIF
-Datang security menyambut dengan ramah
-Kamar baik dan bersih fasilitas lengkap.
-Saat malam AC dingin banget dimana bikin nyenyak tidur.
-Air panas saat malam hari menyala ketika digunakan tidak seperti hotel lain
-Staf saat breakfast ramah2 dan cekatan.
-Jenis dan varian menu breakfast banyak. Suka dengan sosis dan mash potatonya. Omelete creammy dan paling enak ada sejenis kroket bulat yang buat saya juara. Enak dan lumer isinya.

NEGATIF
-Kurang terampilnya Resepsionis sampai nunggu 30 menit untuk masuk kamar.
-Besoknya pas jam 10 ditelepon menanyakan cek out atau overstay. Saya jawab late cek out karena saya baru masuk kamar jam 15.00 wib lalu dijawab ketus mbaknya itu dah dianggap overstay.
-Berhubung pertama kali di hotel ini pas malam setelah saya cari makan saya tanya dengan Resepsionis dimana letak untuk breakfast dan mas2nya hanya menunjuk tanpa ada kata2. Kurang banget ya attitudenya
-Sewaktu cek out tidak ucapan greting atau terima kasih.
-Ada rambut panjang menempel di kaca wastafel kamar

Seandainya bisa ya. Kurangi aja bintang pada hotel ini Resepsionis itu Front Of House. Kalo jelek ya pasti semua ikut jelek. Wes kapok.....!!!!

So G Suite Hotel Prime Location But Lack Of Staff Manner

text:
Di G suites saya menginap di kamar junior. Untuk ukuran kamar bisa dibilang kecil sekali bahkan meskipun tanpa banyak furnitur sudah terlihat sempit.
Wastafel ada diluar kamar mandi didekat pintu masuk utama. Tidak ada lemari hanya ada gantungan baju di depan kaca. Tapi bed cukup nyaman dengan selimutnya yang tebal juga membuat tidur nyenyak :D.
Beruntungnya lagi dapat kamar di lantai 7, sehingga pemandangan kota bagus di malam atau pagi hari.
Untuk breakfast, standar, tidak terlalu istimewa tapi masih ada beberapa pilihan makanan.
Overall nyaman di hotel ini, tapi belum terlalu spesial untuk kamar juniornya. Ya ada harga ada rupa kali ya. Mungkin bisa berbeda opininya jika di mid roomnya.

kali kedua menginap di hotel ini, namun sayang di sayang kamar tamu kali ini berbeda jauh dari bayangan ,secara pengalaman pertama yang berkesan saat pertama menjadi tamu di hotel ini.

intinya untuk kamar ini menurut saya sangat tidak sesuai dengan harga,
namun untuk sisi fasilitas dan keramahan staff tetap terjaga dalam arti kata friendly dan membantu sekali.

owner_response.text:
Dear Lennynoviarensy,

Terima kasih telah meluangkan waktu Ibu untuk menulis review di Tripadvisor. Tentunya komentar dan saran Ibu sangat berharga bagi pengembangan kami ke depannya.

Kami adalah hotel dengan konsep minimalis namun efisien. Standard room amenities yang kami sediakan di kamar adalah memang 1 slipper untuk 1 kamar, namun dengan senang hati dapat kami tambahkan by request. Untuk kedatangan Ibu di kemudian hari, silahkan request melalui operator kami jika bapak membutuhkan 2 slipper di kamar. 

Foto - foto yang kami sediakan di Gallery kami adalah foto sesuai dengan aslinya, dan kami sertakan pula ukuran kamar-kamar kami. Kami berusaha memberikan deskripsi yang sedetail mungkin kepada tamu-tamu kami. Kami mohon maaf jika pelayanan dan fasilitas kami kurang memenuhi standar Ibu, dan kami mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Kritik dan masukan Ibu sangat berharga bagi kami, hal ini telah kami catat dan sampaikan kepada manajemen untuk pengembangan layanan dan fasilitas kami ke depannya.

Terima kasih telah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis review tentang hotel kami. Kami turut senang mengetahui Bapak mendapatkan pengalaman yang cukup memuaskan selama tinggal bersama kami.

Masukan Bapak mengenai welcome drink dan lahan parkir sangat berharga untuk meningkatkan layanan kami kedepannya. Saat ini tamu sudah dapat menikmati welcome drink di G Lounge yang terletak di lantai Ground (sebelah lobby). 
Mengenai lahan parkir, untuk kedatangan Bapak ke depannya ijinkan kami menyarankan Bapak untuk menggunakan layanan valet gratis kami, untuk membantu memudahkan Bapak memarkir kendaraan.

Sekali lagi kami berterimakasih atas rekomendasi yang telah Bapak berikan, kami menunggu selalu kedatangan Bapak kembali di G Suites Hotel Surabaya

Salam Hangat,
Zainul Arifin
General Manager
G Suites Hotel Surabaya

text:
+ bersih, modern minimalist style, ruangan terang, kelengkapan mandi, kaca lebar, ada meja kerja, Ac dingin, heater, air minera, gelas, Lantai tdk berkarpet, posisi tv ideal, ada kursi dan tempat koper, sarapan lumayan, colokan listrik memadai, staff ramah.

- tidak ada kunci kmr mandi, posisi kiblat menghadap kmr mandi-kloset membelakangi kiblat, ac kamar sering menetes air, shower tegak lurus diatas kepala, kmr mandi tanpa kran air utk wudhu, musik dr lt 11 terdengar sampe kamar agak sdkt mengganggu, tidak ada lemari pakaian, posisi wastafel tdk dikamar mandi shg ada cipratan air dilantai dpn pintu, parkir sempit, bekas wadah jus ditukar air putih shg air putih beraroma jus, cleaning service membersihkan gelas dikamar krg hygienis, dgn tangan lsg (bkn spon) diwastafel kmr pdhl tangan habis utk bersih2 lalu melap dgn lap yg ditaruh disaku belakang.
title: Hotel cita rasa anak muda

owner_response.text:
Dear Marmutboy,

Terima kasih telah meluangkan waktu untuk membagi pengalaman Bapak selama tinggal bersama kami. Kami turut senang mengetahui bahwa fasilitas dan pelayanan yang kami tawarkan telah memberikan pengalaman yang mengesankan bagi perjalanan Bapak kali ini.

Terima kasih untuk memberikan review positif dan negatif dengan sangat mendetail tentang hotel kami. Semua ini sangat berharga bagi pengembangan kami kedepannya.

Kami mohon maaf jika ada beberapa hal yang membuat Bapak merasa kurang saat tinggal bersama kami. Hal – hal yang dapat kami perbaiki dengan segera, telah kami ambil tindakan, sehingga kami dapat memberikan pelayanan yang lebih baik lagi kedepannya. 

Saat ini kami memang tidak dapat melakukan perubahan kamar kami, namun hal ini telah kami catat untuk pengembangan ke depannya. Sebagai infomasi, posisi kiblat di dalam kamar kami ada yang menghadap kearah lain, untuk kedatangan Bapak selanjutnya, Bapak bisa mengajukan request untuk kamar dengan kiblat yang menghadap arah yang berbeda. Namun kami tidak dapat menggaransi, karena ketersediaan kamar, tergantung pada kondisi saat Bapak check in, tetapi kami akan berusaha sebaik mungkin memenuhi kebutuhan Bapak.
Terkait lahan parkir, ijinkan kami menyarankan untuk kedatangan Bapak berikutnya, Bapak dapat menggunakan layanan valet gratis kami, untuk kemudahan Bapak memarkir kendaraan.

Semoga kami berkesempatan untuk menyambut kedatangan anda kembali di G Suites Hotel Surabaya dalam waktu dekat

Salam Groovy,
Zainul Arifin
General Manager 
G Suites Hotel Surabaya

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini karena ada biztrip,saya mengajak adik dan juga 1 anak untuk ikut stay 1 malam dihotel ini.
Kamarnya tidak begitu luas tetapi cukup untuk bertiga dan juga ruang kaki untuk anak berjalan2 pun lumayan lah.

Sayang,kamar mandi kecil sekali,tetapi untungnya bersih. Wastafel berada tepat dibalik pintu masuk,jadi agak mengganggu untuk saya,dan juga adanya connecting door cukup membuat kurang nyaman,karena agak sedikit berisik dari kamar sebelah.

Untuk makanan di restonya cukup bervariasi. Saya cukup puas stay di hotel ini. Rencananya akan mencoba menginap di G suite lagi karena belum sempat mencoba poolnya :)

text:
Terletak di tengah kota, dekat dengan berbagai fasilitas (mall, stasiun, restaurant, dll) menjadikan G suites sebagai pilihan yang patut dipertimbangkan. Sebagai hotel budget, fasilitas cukup memadai. Kondisi cukup bersih, baik ruangan maupun perlengkapan (sprei, sarung bantal, handuk, dll). Free wifi di kamar. Luas ruangan cukup bahkan untuk menggelar sajadah. Hanya saja posisi kiblat menghadap kamar mandi, agak tidak nyaman. Juga posisi shower di atas kepala langsung, mungkin sebaiknya menempel di dinding samping saja. 
So far everything are oke.

text:
Saat saya ke Surabaya pertengahan bulan Mei 2015, saya hampir putus asa dengan kondisi semua hotel yang sudah penuh, dikarenakan ada banyak goverment yg menginap di surabaya.
Hotel sana-sini penuh, ada sih yang kosong tapi harga dinaikan jadi selangit, saya hampir putus asa, lalu saya di sarankan oleh supir taxi untuk mencoba di G suites hotel dikarenakan dekat dengan stasiun kereta api Gubeng. Tidak disangka, hotel di tengah kota dan dekat dengan semua fasilitas kota, ternyata memasang tarif harga yang begitu murah dengan keadaan sangat bersih, memiliki fasilitas yang terbilang lengkap bagi saya, sungguh membuat saya saat itu berfikir kalau ini hari keberuntungan saya bisa berada di G suites Hotel.
Mulai hari itu saya memprioritaskan G Suites hotel sebagai tujuan menginap pertama saya saat saya ke Surabaya.

text:
Awal April yang lalu akhirnya saya berkesempatan untuk bermalam di Surabaya (sebelum-sebelumnya hanya transit saja sehingga belum pernah berjalan-jalan di kotanya). Perjalanan tersebut cukup mendadak dan saya tidak punya waktu yang banyak untuk melakukan survey untuk tempat menginap. Untuk itu saya mempercayakan hasil review pengunjung yang di-unggah ke Tripadvisor. Pilihan saya jatuh pada hotel ini. Selain karena lokasi hotel, dari sekian banyak ulasan yang ditampilkan Tripadvisor untuk hotel ini, servicenya cukup baik.

Ulasan-ulasan tersebut benar. Lokasi hotel ini berada di pusat kota Surabaya. tidak begitu jauh juga dari Mall besar yang ada di kota tersebut dan juga tidak terlalu jauh dari tempat yang akan saya kunjungi. Receptionist sangat ramah dan mengerti dengan baik sekali apa yang harus mereka lakukan untuk memberikan setiap informasi yang ingin saya dapatkan. door man dan security pun sangat ramah dan membantu. Suasana lobby cukup nyaman dan bergaya minimalis. Sekilas memperhatikan kondisi cukup rapi dan bersih. 

Setelah semua urusan check in selesai, saya pun masuk ke kamar. Kondisi kamar memang tidak begitu besar. Namun rapi dan bersih. Desainnya pun cukup baik dan saya sukali warnanya, "Ungu". Channel TV yang ada sangat banyak. Sehingga jika ingin beristirahat dulu di dalam kamar, kita bisa mendapatkan hiburan yang cukup.

Terdapat mini swimming pool di hotel ini. Dan ketika saya di sana, hampir setiap sore disediakan cemilan makanan ringan secara gratis di salah satu lantai untuk semua tamu hotel. Makanan di hotel cukup baik. Saya hanya sempat mencoba salah satu menu melalui jasa room service.

Hotel ini juga menyediakan jasa spa dan sauna. Terapist massage yang menangani saya sangat bagus dan baik. Saya benar-benar merasakan rileks setelah melakukan massage.

Laundry hotel juga bisa melayani dengan baik dan cepat. Saat itu saya membutuhkan pakaian saya di-pressing, dan mereka bisa melakukannya dengan cepat.

Hotel ini merupakan hotel bintang 3 yang cukup baik dan bisa direkomendasikan.
title: Weekend Getaway

text: minggu sore saya berangkat tugas ke surabaya untuk workshop di area Gubeng surabaya. cuaca semarang yang panas dan kemudian gerimis menambah suasana lelah setelah flight. dengan bantuan teman saya meluncur dari bandara juanda ke Hotel G Suites ini. kata temen sih area gubeng termasuk hotel ini merupakan area berkembang. Hotel ini terletak di sebrang RS Siloam dan tempat saya workshop. untuk PNS kita dapat diskon.hehe..lumayan mengirit anggaran negara. hotel dengan konsep hotel budget modern ini dari luar terlihat menarik namun standar. ternyata setelah layanan loby saya dapat tahu persis bahwa hotel ini benar-benar nyaman dengan tema smart, simple dan modern. kamar saya dapat di area merokok di lantai 11, ternyata saya tidak cocok jadi tuker kamar.proses tukar kamar pun dilayani dengan senyum dan ramah.pindah ke lantai 8. masuk lift pun tidak sembarang orang bisa.hanya orang yang punya kartu kamar hotel yang bisa akses lift dan pintu loby kamar. loby simple bercampur dengan resto/lounge yang setiap malam ada event DJ. di lantai 11 ada cafe terbuka dengan pemandangan daerah gubeng. bila mau sauna, whirpool dan fitnes center ada di lantai 11. sauna dan whirpooll?? hotel kecil tapi lengkap booss...i like this..capek penat langsung relaksasi. open dari jam 6 pagi sampe jam 10 malem.asiiikk...kafenya juga menarik dengan harga murah.pilihan menu nusantara untuk sarapan juga ada jamu tradisional. untuk kamar kita model aquarium sehingga bisa melihat pemandangan kota area gubeng.keren bos kalo malem. kamar hotel type budget emang ukuran pas hanya untuk rehat. lampu LED dan interior simple fungsionalitasnya. naek taksi dari area gubeng sampai bandara cukup 110rb saja. pake taxi yang jelas aja bos. yang biasa saya pake sih seragam biru gitu.hehe...aman dan valid hargane. kenapa saya nilai rata-rata..karena hotel yang sangat bagus ini baru saya datangin pertama kali. semoga kualitas pelayanan manajemen G Suites tetap menjaga pelayanan prima.salut dan sukses...

text:
Lokasi cukup strategis, nggak terlalu jauh dari tourism spot di pusat Surabaya, tapi juga nggak crowded. Pelayanan sangat baik dan ramah. Plus, entah kenapa seragam orang2 G Suites nggak cuma baju tapi juga warna rambut merah tembaga gitu. Saya dapat kamar 511. Begitu buka pintu kamar, disambut westafel. Aneh banget.

Kamar mandi sangat sempit. Kaca pembatas kamar mandi langsung nempel sama kasur. Jadi kalau tidur nengok ke kiri bisa nyium dinding kaca kamar mandi, persisnya kaca yang membatasi kasur dengan toilet. Untung saja enggak ada yang lagi buang air pas saya tidur. Nggak lucu donk nengok kiri, buka mata, yang dilihat siluet orang buang air. Tata letak kamarnya enggak banget deh.

Ada bau kurang sedap di kamar mandi, seperti bau besi berkarat atau sejenisnya. Nggak ada keran di shower roomnya, jadi kalau wudhu harus di westafel depan pintu masuk. Akibatnya depan pintu jadi becek.

Saya di kamar 511. Kalau buka jendela, pemandangannya aduhai: HOTEL TETANGGA. Nggak cuma 1, 3 hotel sekaligus bisa dipantau langsung dari kamar saya.
title: Lokasi ok, kamar nggak ok, pelayanan lumayan

owner_response.text:
Dear TikaWe,

Terima kasih telah meluangkan waktu Ibu untuk menulis review di Tripadvisor. Tentunya komentar dan saran Ibu sangat berharga bagi pengembangan kami ke depannya.

Kami adalah hotel dengan konsep yang baru, groovy, dengan property gaya minimalis. Seragam merah – hitam, dan rambut yang diwarnai kami jadikan ciri khas kami, untuk memberikan kesan unik dan fresh. 

Kami mohon maaf jika Ibu merasa kurang nyaman dengan penataan kamar kami. Kami berusaha memberikan tatanan yang minimalis namun efisien untuk para tamu kami. Jika Ibu berkenan, kami memiliki tipe kamar yang lebih besar, yaitu Grand Gallery, dengan luas 40m2, dilengkapi kamar mandi terpisah dan bathtub. 

Hotel kami terletak strategis di pusat kota Surabaya yang merupakan kota bisnis, karena itu tentunya para tamu kami dapat secara leluasa melihat pemandangan kota Surabaya, termasuk gedung – gedung dan hotel – hotel lain yang terletak di pusat kota. Harap dimaklumi.

Sekali lagi kami ucapkan terima kasih, saran - saran Ibu telah kami catat dan akan menjadi bahan pertimbangan untuk perbaikan kedepannya. Kami menunggu kembali kedatangan Ibu di G Suites Hotel Surabaya.

Salam Groovy,

text: saya menginap di saat long weekend 3-5 april 15. Pertama masuk hotel ini, disambut oleh staf yang ramah. pelayanan cukup oke, tetapi kurang menanggapi permintaan saya. saya request mau pinjam pemotong kuku, staf bilang akan dicek dan dikabarin, ternyata sampai saya pulang tidak diberi kabar. kamar yang saya inap tipe junior suites. kamar cukup kecil, tetapi rapi dan bersih. ranjang nya sangat keras untuk ukuran ranjang di indonesia. Kerasnya setara dengan hotel di cina. ranjang keras bagus untuk tulang punggung, tetapi rata-rata orang indonesia tidak suka ranjang keras. kolam renang yang ada juga sangat kecil, lebih cocok disebut kolam berendam daripada kolam renang. gym cukup bagus walaupun kecil, tetapi lumayan lengkap untuk berlatih beban. saya mendapat free bubur setelah gym dan berendam. rasa buburnya cukup enak. overall dengan harga yang murah, hotel ini sangat direkomendasikan walaupun tidak terlalu bagus jika dilihat dari sisi pelayanan.

text:
Saya inap satu malam waktu berlibur ke Surabaya. Hotel 15 menit jalan kaki dari stasiun gubeng. Kamarnya lumayan kecil tapi bersih. Shower mungkin tidak nyaman utk orang berbadan besar karena ukr terkalu kecil.
Di hotel cuma ada 2 lift, jadi kadang2 harus nunggu cukup lama. Di lantai atas ada kolam renang tapi menyurut saya itu kolam ikan.
Kalau mau ke kolam renang harus lewat restauarant yg ada di atap. Waktu saya mau berenang sedang ada meeting jadi nga nyaman. Apa lagi di kolam renang tidak ada handuk. Saya minta tolong sama karyawan untk mengantar handuk tapi nga sampe2.
Ruang sarapan di hotel sangat kecil dan tidak nyaman karena sempit banget. Variasi makanan sangat kecil dan tidak berkualitas. Staff di restoran ramah tapi tidak dilatih dengan baik.
Banyak di buffet yg habis dan baru di isi sesudah saya minta sama karayawan.
title: lokasi strategis tapi sarapan yg tidak memuaskan

text:
Ini kesempatan ke-2 ke surabaya di tahun 2015. Kali ini saya bersama rombongan sebanyak 30 orang. Atas bantuan dari teman yg di surabaya, kami disarankan untuk nginap di G Suites Hotel. G Suites, hotel  yang berlokasi di daerah Gubeng, relatif dekat dengan beberapa pusat perbelanjaan. Sebelum ke surabaya, terlebih dahulu saya telah kontak dengan salah seorang karyawan G Suites, Mba Via Irianti. Tanpa kesulitan saya memesan 16 kamar, bahkan ketika saya terpaksa harus menambah kamar karena ada perubahan personil, itupun terlayani dengan baik. Setiba di hotel, proses check ini berjalan dengan lancar, bahkan proses pembayaran pun dilaksanakan bukan didepan counter resepsionis, tapi di G Lounge, maklum lagi rame, dan itu pun terlayani. 
Secara keseluruhan, G Suites hotel, yg katanya Mba Via mengusung konsep "FRESH", emang coba ditunjukkan dengan cara penataan ruangan, mulai dari lobi, lounge sampai kamar pun demikian. Dengan rate 400 ribuan semalam termasuk makan pagi, sudah cukup memadai menimbang lokasi yg strategis, makan pagi dan kamar yang bersih rapi. UKuran kamar memang tidak terlalu luas, namun sudah cukup memadai bagi yang hanya nginap malam saja, sedang siangnya keluyuran. Tp buat saya yg senang mengurung diri di kamar pun, ukuran tidak masalah yg penting kebersihan, kelengkapan kamar dan jauh dari kebisingan.
Bagi yg senang nongkrong, G Suites menyediakan live music setiap malam di G Lounge. G Lounge walaupun tidak terlalu luas, namun dengan penyajian yg OK dan performance band nya juga OK, bisa bikin betah, tp akan lebih betah kalau berdua (kayaknya..hahaha). G Suites juga sangat ramai pengunjungnya, dari bermacam kalangan.
Secara keseluruhan, G Suites hotel menawarkan keramahan, kebersihan, lokasi, dan pelayanan yang sangat baik bagi anda yg mau ke surabaya, tp harga terjangkau.
Mungkin yg bisa saya sarankan, jika pengelola hotel berkenan, menu makanan pagi nya lebih dibuat fresh lagi penyajiannya, walaupun tetap mengusung menu nusantara sebagai andalannya.
Pada kesempatan ini saya mengucapkan terima kasih kepada Mba Via dkk yg sudah sangat membantu kami selama berada di G Suites. Semoga bisa berkunjung di lain waktu dengan suasana yg sama.. See u..
title: layanan OK banget buat saya..

text:
We paid SGD 126 for three nights from Friday to Sunday(9 - 11 Dec) which means 42 bucks per night. Divided by two, one person pays 21 dollars for a night. 

Breakfast usually costs about 40k which is about 4-5 sgd, so 16-17 for a night is about right.

Wifi is good, breakfast is standard with rice and Indonesian dishes, there's milk and cereal too. Not much food stalls nearby though, you have to walk a distance to get food. (Unless you don't mind expensive cafes or relatively empty stalls.) 

There's a pool and sauna for those who want to relax after a long day. The hotel is quite well-known so drivers tend to know where is it.
title: Good for price

title: nice hotel

text:
My better half and I stayed in this hotel for two nights during our recent visit to Surabaya. It is located not far from the city centre but there are other similar class hotels which are more strategically located and nearer to the biggest shopping complex, the Tunjungan Plaza. The Juanda Airport is about 45 minutes away by taxi if the traffic jam is not really bad. The Submarine Monument next to the Surabaya Plaza is about 15 minutes walk away.
The hotel is not very big (only 118 rooms) but has all the facilities that a short term guest would need including a gym, a sauna and a lounge/bar cum kitchen where a live band performs in the evening. Our room was not big too but it was very clean. The bed was firm and comfortable. The bathroom was dry and the water from the shower was very powerful. Hot and cold water were available. The hotel was generous with the supply of towels. Complimentary coffee and tea were provided together with an electric kettle. A LCD television with many cable station channels and a small refrigerator were also available. The air-conditioning was quiet and cool. Wifi signal in the room was strong too.
The buffet breakfast is served from 7.00 a.m. in the lounge on the ground floor. The menu consists of various types of western and local foods including fried noodles, gado-gado and porridge. Definitely more than enough choices for most guests in a three-star hotel. Honestly, to expect more would be unfair.
Checking in and out was fast and hassle-free. The receptionists were polite and helpful. Taxi service is readily available in front of the hotel. We noticed that for guests who drove, parking was quite a problem. Overall, this is a recommendable hotel for visitors to Surabaya.
title: Simple, Clean and Comfortable Hotel

photos.caption: Breakfast in the ground floor lounge.
Dressing table and mini refrigerator below.

text: Came for a night to take the train the next day. Receptionist was super slow in making our room ready. The room we order was non smoking one and they gave us the stinky room with an ashtray in the room. Guess what else? Room service is exceptionally slow for any simple request we have. I'm writing this while coughing up waiting to be transferred to a different room since an hour ago!! Never again. Not recommended. Padahal saya bukan orang yg gampang complain lho.. Terrible!
title: Horrible service!

text:
The hotel and room were perfectly adequate: clean, modern, functioning air-conditioning plus the breakfast was OK(standard, nothing fancy). So if you're looking for that you won't be disappointed.

However the receptionists were completely unhelpful with inquiries about a trip to the Bromo. They provided us a lot of clearly wrong information and didn't seem to know anything about the surroundings. It didn't help that her English was very bad. My advice would be to plan everything yourself, don't expect any help from the staff and you'll be fine :).
title: Reasonable hotel, receptionist drove us insane

text: We liked this hotel a lot. The downstairs bar is a little to trashy but the rooftop coffee/pool/restaurant area is fantastic. And it has a great view of the city. Our room was very clean. text:
This is my first day of stay and I will stay for another 2 days. I usually stay at the other hotels which is more hommy and quiet. This time, I just want to move to other hotel.
Personally, I have no idea what is the aim of this hotel? Business, Resort or Entertainment? If you come for business, I recommend choose other hotels with the same rate which is more quiet and far away from disturbance. Resort, definetly not. Entertainment, not sure.  
Upon my check-in, I got my room full of smell of fragance and the mal-function of the Deposit Box. Fortunately the staff directly fix the safe deposit. At night, when I wrote this review, I still awake due to the sound of their bar at the Ground Floor. I can not imagine the guests who stay at the second floor. I stayed at the third floor. I complaint to front desk and he said that the bar is open 24 hours. Wowww, what kind of hotel is this? Do they understand that the sound is really annoying? Do they think about the comfortness of the guests?
I asked the Front Staff to move me to upper floor. Hopefully they can give me the upper floor to avoid the sound of the bar. Definetely, I will not stay here again and I will not recommend to others.
title: Things of The Hotel Building: Bad Sound Proof

owner_response.text:
Dear MarakSetiadiS,

Thank you for your time sharing your experience during stay with us. Please accept our sincere apologize for your inconvenience during your stay with us. 

You will always be our important guest for us, and your comment surely are valuable for us. G Suites Hotel is a groovy and lifestyle hotel that is why we are supported by young, hip, and dynamic concept. That is why we’re supported by 24 hours Lounge & Bar and roofbar café, which off course will be supported by entertainment. Even though we’re open 24 hour, our live DJ entertainment start from 11.00 PM – 01.00 AM (weekdays), and 02.00 AM (weekend).   

We have standard fragrance setup in our alley only, to refresh the air since this is a closed building and different with resort which has many air circulation. We are really sorry regarding safe deposit box malfunction. Thank you to let us know, so that we could assist you immediately. Thank you also to let us know that you need quieter room, we’re more than happy to assist you to moved your room to higher floor at that time. 

We’re sorry that our hotel concept are not meet your expectation. We always try our best to make your stay more comfortable. Your kind understanding is highly appreciated.

Once again, thank you and we’re always looking forward to welcoming you again at G Suites Hotel Surabaya.

Keep Groovy,
Eggy Rigata

text:
I stayed at the gsuites on the 1st of January 2016. My stay started well with an early check in (noon) and a nice corner room on the seventh floor. The room is well laid out, though one side of the bed was up against a wall. Not a big deal though.

However I would not recommend this hotel. Why? Well because of the following:

The safe did not work, not only could it not be opened but it was not fixed to anything, so I could easily pick it up and take it with me should I have wanted to. This was a massive inconvenience as it meant I could not take my planned morning run as I had nowhere to lock my cash and other belongings. Very annoying.

I was thankful for the pillow case and sheet that I carry for emergencies. All the linen had significant stains. I almost hope they were permanent as if they weren't I would be concerned that the linen isn't fresh for each guest.

I presume the towels started there life white, they are now grey and well and truly frayed. They would make great rags for my garage.

For RP 391,000 without breakfast this hotel is not up to standard. I have stayed in $5 and $400 hotels, so I am comfortable with paying for what you get, but in this case the price for a dirty, unsecured room was too much.

Find another hotel in Surabaya.
title: Dirty and lacking what it promises

Dear Marini T,

Thank you for writing a review about our hotel. Your comments and advises are important for us to keep improving our service quality.

Please accept my apologies for any inconvenience you experience during your stay with us. Regarding your request for room type and smoking floor, we have explain in all booking source that all requests are based to availability during check in and cannot guaranteed before arrival. In your case, during your check in, Mid Gallery King Size and no smoking floor are not available, therefore we have to offer you other available rooms at that time. And yes, we downgraded your room to Junior Gallery, since you asking for King Size bed, but we have inform you about this and execute under your approval. Based on that we consider that your approval is acceptance.

We will carefully check the shower in your room, and will make necessary action if any repair needed. For your next stay, may we suggest to contact our front office team if you have any difficulties, we will happy to assist you.

 I think it's probably the first few times the staff have seen a foreigner stay in that hotel. text:
When I travel I primarily look for a hotel, which fulfills three most important things which are accommodation, food and location and Hotel G suites strikes a perfect balance with all the above. 

The stay was really very comfortable as the basic hygiene standards of this 3 star is at par with any 4-5(most) star facility. The entire staff is very friendly and at their toes to help you out. Especially Mr. Donny ( manager -front desk), makes sure that every guest feels privileged and super special.

The food here will suit every palate. The breakfast buffet is lavish spread among Asian cuisine. With one 24 hour restro-bar and a roof top cafe adjoining swimming pool will make sure you are never hungry in the city.

The location is almost centre of the city which gives you an easy access to the entire city.

All in all, an excellent option for any kind of travel in Surabaya.
title: Very Comfortable Stay combined with great food

text:
Booked for one night but arrived a day earlier due to change of plans.  Front desk readily acceded to my request for an additional night at about the same rate.

Smallish but new hotel.  Modern décor and generally well-maintained.  Two lifts served 12 storeys and there was a bit of waiting sometimes.  Room was reasonably-sized.  The first night I had a room located in the quadrant of the hotel (rooms 10 to 14) closest to a pedestrian crossing outside the hotel. The beeping alert emitted from the crossing came on whenever a pedestrian used the crossing and could be heard in the room.  This was an irritant and a definite no-no especially for light sleepers.  Again, front desk came to the rescue and agreed without any fuss to my request for a room-change for the second night.

Tried the swimming pool on the 11th storey but it was more like a dip pool.  Located just next to a “roof-top” bar which served food and drinks and offered a good view of the city.  Tried the G lounge at the ground floor.  Service was good and the prices affordable.  It turned into a loud-music lounge at night with a live DJ.  Breakfast was average and offered the usual local spread.

Not really centrally-located.  There are shopping malls nearby e.g. Great City, accessible by 5-minute taxi ride.  I walked to Tunjungan Plaza and that took about 25 minutes.

Overall, not a top-notch hotel but acceptable for its price.
title: New and alright for its price!

text:
This is an excellent value mid-range hotel.  This is a high rise building on the other side of the city from the train station so a long taxi ride and a bit of a walk from the city center but other than that it is a good choice.

The rooms are well appointed for this price range.  They have outstanding views, good amenities, flat TVs with lots of channels, small but usable showers and sinks and comfortable beds.  There is a very nice small pool overlooking the city, a small and hot gym with some new cardio equipment and a TV, combined together with a nice small restaurant and bar area.    

The ground floor has a decent restaurant, which has a great breakfast buffet in the mornings.  

The location is a little bit far out of town, but in ten minutes you can walk up to the beginning of the main part of the city and continue on from there, or there are almost always taxis hanging around near the lobby.

Friendly staff, clean, very good value.
title: Excellent value mid-range hotel

text:
I stayed one night at the G Suites Hotel for business purpose. I booked through the hotel's website because I had read somewhere that if you booked through online travel agent (Traveloka, in this case) you couldn't pick the type of bed you wanted (single traveler got twin beds, for example). The price offered was pretty much the same anyway. I booked two rooms, one was a mid gallery, the other a grand gallery. The checking in process was quite fast, but I was rather disappointed when informed that the mid gallery room with king size bed (or queen size?) was sold out and I had to settle with a room with twin beds instead. Twin beds for one person. Ha.

My room was the mid gallery. They advertised the room as having 18 square meters. Didn't feel like it though. The room, eventhough nice-looking, was small. I had been to cheaper budget hotel that had bigger room than this. There was almost no space left for me to do Islamic prayer. I had to concede though that the space was used efficiently. The room was clean enough and everything seemed to be working. The bed was comfortable. The usual thing with newer building was the walls were quite thin, I could hear my neighbor's phone ringing. The bathroom was also relatively clean, it provided standard toiletries (I particularly liked the shampoo-shower gel combo), but it was tiny. The toilet and the shower looked cramped in it. Showering without getting the whole floor wet was a Herculean task. One thing that struck me as weird was the inconsiderate placement of washbasin next to the room door. I mean, the water could easily get to the floor and make it slippery, or leave dirty stains if mixed with dust.

I had some time to explore the hotel, so I headed to the advertised facilities, namely whirpool, sauna, sky lounge and gym at the 11th floor. To called it a pool would be an overstatement. Just like most things at the hotel, the pool was small. You couldn't exactly swim in it, just indulging in a long soak. The view was nice though. Similarly, the gym was equipped with basic working out machine but it was small.

The breakfast buffet was officially available from 6 am, but I was able to dig in earlier, which was a plus because I was on tight schedule. It offered quite a selection, mostly Indonesian dishes and the taste was okay.

The hotel staff was generally helpful and kind so I had no complaint about that. The location of the hotel was also good, near Gubeng train station and shopping malls. There were a lot of place to eat around the hotel and getting taxi was easy. The parking space was limited, so some guests had to park on the street. All in all, G Suites Hotel felt more like a budget hotel that incorporated some elements of a three star hotel.
title: Nice Hotel, But Small in Almost Everything

owner_response.text:
Dear Octoryna,

Thank you for sparing your time and write a review about our hotel. First of all, please know that all your comments and suggestions are valuable for us, and kindly allow us to clarify some points below.

Thank you for reserve directly to our website. By making a direct booking, you have made a way for direct communication with hotel. It is a false information that if you booked through travel agent – online or offline, and you’re unable to pick the bed type. 
To clarify this, please be informed that all bedding type and other special request (such as floor request, smoking and non smoking room, etc) are “Subject to Availability”, applied through all guest, and through all booking channels. 
The ability to fulfill the request, always depend whether the requested room is available or not during guest check in.
It is happen in all hotels, because we all have limitation in room type and bed type. Especially in high occupancy, we might cannot afford all guest requests because of this limitation. For example: Let’s say hotel have 30 rooms with King Size Bed, and 30 rooms with Twin Share bed, meanwhile we have 41 guests request for King Size bed. When this situation happens, then there will be 11 guests unable to get their request. That is why, all special request have to set under subject to availability, and cannot guaranteed prior check in.

Our Mid Gallery rooms have 18 sqm size as stated. Our hotel designed in minimalist and compact style, to have efficient functionality of every parts of the rooms, just like you said. Someway, the rooms with twin share bed style, giving smaller atmosphere, because they have 2 beds inside. I’m happy to know that you enjoyed our rooms, and bed during your stay. 

About our facilities, glad to know that you have time to enjoy our facilities, which mostly not provided in 3 star hotel. 
Our whirlpool, called whirlpool, because it’s not a swimming pool, but a plunge pool, that is why the size is smaller than swimming pool, because the purpose is not for swimming. 

I’m glad to know that even with our plus and minus, in general you have enjoyed your stay with us. Once more a huge thank you for sharing your experience. Hope some explanation above could explain the misunderstanding.

We do looking forward to welcoming you again at G Suites Hotel Surabaya.

Keep Groovy,
Zainul Arifin
General Manager
G Suites Hotel Surabaya

text: G Suites is a great hotel; excellent value for money, and in the smallest suite, more that  big enough for a 10 day business trip. Clean, compact, new, tea and coffee facilities, excellent, excellent wifi (3rd floor and I asked for this specifically), fridge, TV with 10 international channels (think news and Discovery/Animal Planet...), gym, sauna, small pool, basic outdoor facilities on the 11th floor where you can order room service to bring a cold drink. Breakfast adequate, mostly Indonesian but some fresh fruit, cereals and white toast available. I haven't tried dinner but suspect it would also be adequate. Price is a little steep and considering around the corner you can find my favourite vegetarian/vegan chain in the world, the local Indonesian Loving Hut, serving absolutely delish Indonesian food with Tempe, tofu and fungi derivatives, why would one stay in the hotel restaurant. They serve beer and such, but very pricey. There is loud music (DJ as well as  live music) being played in the the restaurant/bar in the evening, if that's your thing. Good location in town, but unfortunately no local corner store/dairy/bodega/7-11 nearby for cheap beer, snacks and water, so you'll have to take a taxi (cheap) to a supermarket or mall. In all a very comfy stay. Rooms not noisy. Staff friendly.
title: Great little modern hotel with all the amenities you'd want!

text:
My experience of the hotel was generally good. G Suites is a mid price range hotel but with its modern décor, it feels more upmarket.

Pros
- Rather small but well appointed room. Well designed so you can have function and style in smaller space (the clothes hanger was in the 'living area'). 
- Comfortable big clean bed, well set up so you can enjoy TV while relaxing. Good English channel selection with News and Film.
- Great breakfast selection. Mainly local dishes but you can have bread/eggs if Asian is not your preferred breakfast.
- Clean rooms and nice strong water pressure in shower
- Friendly staff
- There is a decent gym which I unfortunately didn't get a chance to utilize
- Taxi to station takes 15min and is about Rp 20k

Cons
- Some members of reception spoke no English so I had to always be put through to someone who was fluent when calling reception
- The Top 20's music in restaurant/breakfast area is a little to loud in the morning to start the day
- I had to ask for my laundry as it didn't come back before 9pm as stated in the form

Overall I was pleased with the hotel which is suitable for business and holiday purposes. 

My main issue was the in room massage. After a long trek in East Java, I was looking forward to the advertised service. The therapist called but spoke no English. After not being able to understand each other, she arrived 30min early finding me unprepared. She was friendly but finished my 90min massage after 70min. I was surprised and used the '10min Free Voucher' given by the hotel (which initially I wasn't going to). Not looking pleased, she continued for 10min. When finished, I enquired why it was short. From what I could gather, the 90min started when she arrived at the lobby. Coming to the room, setting up, explaining etc is part of the 90min. I was disappointed and irritated but what could I do? She spoke enough English to ask me for a tip before she left though.

I would urge management to consider their service providers as it is a shame to ruin an otherwise lovely stay in a modern, well run hotel.
title: Modern Budget Hotel Near Gubeng Train Station

The one big problem was that they advertise having a whirlpool/ jacuzzi, but it is not in fact a jacuzzi, more like a cold wading pool.  The roof area is surprisingly swanky for a discount hotel and has a really great view of the city!  Very close to the train station.
title: Nice clean hotel- not really a jacuzzi!

text:
My second experience staying at this hotel, from 09 - 11 Dec 2014 I slept in room 316. In general, I did not find any significant problems during my stay, but something weird and disappointing happened on the second day: the case was exactly the same like my first stay on May 2014. I left my room at 7 AM and when I came back in the afternoon 3.15 PM, I found my room was not cleaned up by the housekeeping staffs. I called the front office staff and made a complaint, but the housekeeping staff came to my room 25 minutes later after I made 2x complaint calls to the front office. It took around 25 minutes to clean up my room, so totally I must wait and cannot take a rest in my room around 50 minutes. Same identically bad case happened 2 times in my 2 different visits in 7 months without any progress, I'm sure this hotel needs to evaluate their house keeping's SOP. 

Pros: warm welcome greetings, fast check in - check out, friendly staffs, the room is not too large but efficient, centrally located, near shops and local restaurant, easy to get a taxi, free internet wifi connection with average speed, good free fitness center with whirlpool and sauna. 
Cons: pricey, cannot sleep well because of hard mattress and pillow, shower temperature was not too warm, no zero calorie / diet sweetener in room or restaurant, on the 2nd day afternoon when I returned from my office I found my room was not cleaned by the housekeeping staffs. Hope the room will cleaned up automatically every day like other normal stars hotels on my next visit.
title: Friendly but need to improve services.

text:
This is an excellent value for money hotel.  The rooms are clean, modern, neat and quiet.  The staff are very helpful and speak good English.  While the hotel is not in the middle of Surabya, that does matter as everything is within a 30 minute / 50,000 Rp taxi ride.  There are several excellent restaurants nearby, with top of the list being Layar, which specialises in fresh seafood and is a 5 minute taxi ride away.  The hotel itself has a good casual dining menu and I recommend the beef ribs at 50,000 Rp.  Another good restaurant on the other side of the street and about 200 metres away is the Golden Rama Seafood restaurant.

The hotel also has excellent entertainment almost every evening with DJ Lopez playing from 9pm.  She is a young DJ with a bright future and I am sure she will develop a strong following.  The bar manager Reymond is very helpful and speaks excellent English.

I was so impressed with the hotel I have stayed there twice - both to and from Malang. I plan to return.
title: Great value hotel.

It's a compact hotel. Compact room, compact restaurant.... errr, you can name it both three of restaurant, cafe, and bar ^_^. I love the fresh ambiance and atmosphere. The room it's a bit small, but proper. They have in-room safe deposit (yayyy... ^_^), the room design it's new and futuristic (the staff said that the rooms have various color themes). More important thing, there's a break limit between the shower and the toilet bowl, so the toilet won't wet. The location also great, near malls, and a lot of access to culinary activity around. Can't say the price is cheap, but definitely proper. 

One minus thing: It would be more comfortable if they set a lower volume for the music corridor, especially during the night.

text:
At first, I didn't have any expectations, given its low-cost nature and its strategic location in Gubeng area (near the CBD). But upon arrival, the staffs were extremely friendly and helpful, from assisting my check-in (which was a breeze) and handling my luggage. But the most unique thing was that they were young, energetic, and most of their hair were dyed; not mentioning the corridor music which played top recent pop chart, giving the impression that this hotel is full of energy and dynamic. The room themselves were decent and clean, although the bathroom was a bit cramped for the smallest room type. The availability of free gym, whirlpool, and sauna with a great view of Surabaya CBD amazed me, since it's rare for a hotel at this price range. Breakfast was tasty and had enough variety, although was a bit too carb-laden; not really suitable for health-conscious people.

Overall, this hotel is recommended for those seeking a budget accomodation in the centre of the city with a fresh concept, and free gym.
title: Low cost doesn't always mean low service

text:
We checked-in almost midnight, but the staff still eager to received us. Late night dinner would not be a big deal since the strategic location (Gubeng area) allow you to get various food, from hawker food to semi-fine dining, within a walking distance. The room was not as large as we expected, but it was functional and clean with hip interior. However, loud music from the lounge downstairs kinda too noisy for us. Clearly, this hotel is not for family.

Breakfast was decent with too much carbo. The location, again, pleased us the next day, since we spent very cheap taxi fare to places of interest such as House of Sampoerna, Hotel Majapahit, and ITS. Even the Submarine Monument, Zangrandi Ice Cream, and Mirota are in walking distance. For us, the whirlpool, sauna, and gym are the big hit of the hotel, since it's rare to find such facilities for budget hotel.
title: A Hip Functional & Affordable Hotel

text:
Location: Its a bit placed on a location quite far from the tourist centre and shopping malls but a short taxi ride will bring you to the destination. Quite far from the airport 40-45mins on a good run with no traffic. 

Room: We were place in 8th floor twin room. It was a good room.. A bit compact in terms of space but it was tidy and clean. It has this modern and chic vibe. Toilet and shower are immaculate

Service: Reception were very nice. Accommodating and all smiles 

Amenities: Rooftop pool is okay. Not that big though. But they have a state of the art sauna. Who used it in a hot humid weather though? But its good to have one. Gym is amazing I had a work out and yhe equipments are nice and new. The place is well ventilated aswll

Food: Breakfast was amazing. Heaps of option to choose from. Indonesian, American ans European foods were all available

Overall, it was a good and pleasant stay. I would recommend this place to anyone who need to stay at Surabaya. Will I go back if I happen to be here. Yes. Definitely :)
title: Relaxing Stay

text:
Wonderful customer service and fantastic, one of the best I've had in a magnitude of travel experiences. Situated near the city center, Striking art, interior designs are evident in all public spaces within the hotel. Good variety of breakfast offering, and I must say a very good coffee barrister. The toiletries and comprehensive in-room supply of stationery, are very nice touches. Strong wifi signals without having the need for complicated log-ins. Bed and linen are clean and comfortable and the sound insulation between rooms are fab.
The rooms are big enough for the price you pay in the city. The bathroom is big, Shower, bathtub and the wash basin is separately fixtured within the room. 
G-Lounge Kitchen & Bar serve good food and also there is live music and DJ performace in the evening time.
Very recommend if you want to stay in Surabaya city.
title: Coolest Boutique Hotel in Surabaya

text:
My first impression of this hotel is tall and not bad and I don't even think if the hotel has 10+ floor, because I got a good price about 300k (from Traveloka). 

Reception are so kind to me, and no need to waiting too long, I get my key and go to lifts.

+ :

The room is little bit spacious, has a good view to Jl.Gubeng, TV with local and international channel, mineral water, safety box, not so modern room but clean. Washbin outside the bathroom with big mirror. Amenities are pretty good.

Breakfast at the lobby level, in the restaurant. I'm amazed, they provide a lot choice of breakfast like a 4 stars hotel, Indonesia and American breakfast are available in here such as nasi goreng, cereal, milk and some cake and dessert and the taste was good in my opinion. Has a smoking area outside the restaurant (outdoor area but facing the parking area and street)

Location just good, near Gubeng station (aprox. 2 km) and nearby mall such as Grand City and Plaza Surabaya also Museum Kapal Selam (submarine museum), to Tunjungan Plaza is about 4 km. 

- but sadly there is not cupboard/closet, just hanger. And the bathroom is so tiny with glass partition and doesnt have any key, even the toilet area is so small. If you sitting on the toilet maybe your knee is touching the glass door and ventilation not so good if you taking a shower with hot water, too much steam.

Worth it. And I recommended, but when you're in Surabaya, online transportation much better.
title: Above Expectation

text:
I came to surabaya because of business trip.  I stayed at G suite only for 1 night.  I kind of person who realy objectives to give value of something.  So here's my review.  

Location
The location of this hotel i must say is the best. Near to everywhere, business center etc. Near to starbucks and restaurants. 

Concierge 
They are polite, always smile and greet guest with their genuine smile. They realy know where i should go to eat,  which transportatio i should use. 

Reception
When i checked in,  no greeting by the reception, no smile,  i had to say the way they explain regarding of my request is poor. I do realy understand all the requested subject to availability, but again if you cant meet the guest expectation at Least apology is a must. They only said "only twin bed remaining,  our hotel is full" no apology or empathy at all. You should learn about politness and how to smile with concierge. 

Room
The room were clean,  it's quite spacious also. Is good for me due to i stayed here only for business trip. Oh maybe you guys can put some more amenities inside the room. The only problem in my room with the ac.  It'not working properly.  I called reception twice ask them to sent someone to check my ac but no one shows up until i checked out.  

Food
The food was not bad,  the had several option from western to indonesian. The only thing that you guys should develope only the seasoning.  There are some dish that they dont have taste at all.  Just like a plain.  

Overall i'm okay with my stay at g suite.  However, the management need to do development regarding of staff skills,  language etc.
title: Just an Okay Hotel

text: Surabaya in fact is just one hour and 30 minutes flying from Jakarta (CGK International Airport) but I never visited it since I have been living in Jakarta for the past four years. So when I decided to go to Surabaya impulsively - because I was hunting the book at Big Bad Wolf - I had to find budget hotel. I did some search through different platforms and G Suites appeared in one of it. I enjoyed my two days of weekend escape here. I like the junior suite I booked: I liked the interior and that they fulfilled my request of staying in a non-smoking room. The room service was nice: I ordered Sup Buntut and it was actually delicious. The room massage was excellent: I liked the therapist very much and had great conversations during the 90 minutes traditional full-body massage. The breakfast had several options but I only eat bread for it so I was okay with what they served. I requested to borrow a hair dryer but stunned by the answer I received from housekeeping. I directly reported this to the front office and they handed me in a hair dryer right after I finished my breakfast: it was a fast response and I was impressed that they did fix my disappointment at the housekeeping answer very quickly. It's located at the central of the city, made it easier to go around: I had no difficulty to order online motorbike service (GrabBike) and to order online car to catch my early morning flight (GrabCar) and the waiting time was acceptable. The hotel was also responsive to my request when cleaning my room. I will consider coming back to this facility for my next visit to Surabaya.
title: Had a Great Time as First Timer in Surabaya

text:
Ok I’ll start with the good....

In no way do I want this review to reflect on the staff of the G Suites. They are kind and hardworking people and impeccable in their customer service. If it wasn’t for them, there is no way I would of even stayed for 5 mins let alone a whole night! They are the only saving grace of this hotel. I found them honest (they returned lost property they could of easily taken) and they accommodated all my requests the best that they could. They all deserve a medal.

The bad....

Rooms are dirty. Lord forbid you get stuck in a smoking room they are disgusting. Stains all over the cloth couches. The non smoking rooms are marginally better. The entire hotel stinks of cigarettes anywhere you walk. 

The bathrooms are filthy and urgently require a deep clean.

The beds are uncomfortable and the pillows are horrid.

The food in the “buffet” is rank and made us both very ill. I’ve travelled all over Indonesia many times and never once been sick until eating at this hotel.

I wore flip flops into the shower such was the grime visible to the naked eye.

I experienced both a smoking room and a non smoking room. The smoking room the aircon worked but the TV was well past it’s used by date with black out on half the screen. The non smoking room the aircon didn’t work but the TV did. The noise from the aircon is horrid. Needs to be replaced.

The black out curtains were not hanging properly and didn’t black out anything. Sun rises early here in the morning so don’t expect a decent nights sleep, that’s if you can sleep at all on those pillows.

The “free minibar” advertised on the website I booked on consisted of one coke, one sprite, two bottles of water and some crisps. But I’ll take that up with the website I booked on. 

I paid $50 (US) for the room, to compare - the Shanghai-La in Surabaya has rooms starting at $90 US and you really can’t even begin to compare the two.

I would never return to this hotel. I spent my remaining night at the Shangri-La which was totally worth the investment of the extra $40. A real no brainer!
title: Stayed one night

text:
G Suites is a memorably, self-consciously "groovy" hotel. Purple decor design touches  brighten bedrooms, which sport big mirrors and good light. Breakfast (adequate buffet spreads of Indonesian dishes and fruits, with egg options freshly cooked) is served in the 24-hour lobby lounge bar area, where TV music and sports channels play non-stop, quietly in the mornings. The rooftop coffee/bar lounge, mysteriously under-promoted (not at all in the bedrooms), has a highly unusual elevated jacuzzi perched beside the bar tables, providing city views from the open-walled high-floor location. It looks a comfortable and healthy option only for devil-may-care students and backpackers. 
Troupe of receptionists were the handsomest, friendliness bunch of youngsters ever seen in an urban business hotel.
title: Good city base with trendy touches

text: With minimalist concept, G Lounge looks quite attractive with the red and black color combination. Once arrived, we were welcomed by a nice but forget-to-be-cleaned sofa beside a large window, sunbathed by nice ray. Trying the "Just Timbel Lunch" menu for 4 pax, included Nasi Timbel and 4 drinks with tea or Cincau choices. It took a long time to the foods and drinks to arrive. And we were quite surprised at the food when it was served since the rice was so plenty that made you think you could not finish it, at least for us. And the dishes was only 1 bowl of super sweet-not sour "Sayur Asem" with a few vegetables, 4 tempe(s), 4 tahu(s), 4 tiny cute bits of chicken (that only consisted of skin and bone, where was the freakin meat?), some not fresh cabbage and cucumbers, and other vegetables. When we eat, we were suprised that the rice was not good quality rice (very bad for a hotel). The chicken is good (sweet flavoured, but only skin, no meat). It really made me laugh out loud (in my heart, of course). I never eat something as weird as this before (large portion of rice and tiny portion of dishes). Even I only eat bone and "soup" of Sayur Asem (without vegetables), since I gave my portion of vegetables and tahu to my parents (and it was still not enough for them). Would not recommend this menu to anyone.
title: G Lounge at G Suite Hotel, so minimalist

text:
Arrived Surabaya in the evening from Pelabuhan Ujung Kamal Madura by Jokotole Ferry.

It's easy to reach by local minibus, just need to walk down around 100 meter to opposite direction since it's located in one way road.

Officially the hotel opens and starts operate on February [6 months], so still super clean for sure! Casual atmosphere felt strong right after we entered the hotel.

Smiling friendly staffs welcomed us.
Fast check in and check out....
Tidy and comfy room with reasonable size, working WiFi, national and international TV channel, including standard hotel complementary is well available.

Breakfast
Not so much choices for foreigner, however their simple bread, omelette and coffee can safe my husband "foreigner" day :) while for me is considered as a happy breakfast [fried rice, porridge, soto, nasi uduk and many more as a local delight are YUMMY...] :P

In the evening :
The hotel restaurant also worked as a hotel club which served food and beverage including cocktail and mocktail at reasonable price companion by local DJ played a music on the weekend.

Overall, good place to stay when you are in Surabaya with clean environment and reasonable rate + few restaurants in just walking distance
title: Surabaya Night

text:
This was my first experience staying at this hotel. From 27 - 29 May 2014 I slept in room 301. In general I did not find any significant problems during my stay.

Pros: fast check in - check out, value for money, friendly staffs, the room is not too large but efficient comfortable and quiet, clean and comfortable bed, strong shower with good warm temperature, breakfast menu is various enough, centrally located, near shops and local restaurant, easy to get taxi, free internet wifi connection with average speed, good free fitness center with whirlpool and sauna. 

Cons: no zero calorie / diet sweetener in room or restaurant, 1 of 2 elevators did not operate on the day 2 of my stay, on the 2nd day afternoon when I returned from my office I found my room was not cleaned by the house keeping staffs. Thanks to the General Manager Mr. Zainul Arifin and his staff who have responsive and quickly resolve my complaint.

I plan to stay at this hotel again on my next visit. Recommended.
title: Good New Hotel

text:
日本領事館へ用事があり、3泊しました。

【部屋】
狭いです。が、1人での滞在には十分です。
きちんと清掃されているので快適です。
【ロケーション】
日本領事館まではホテル前の道路を渡って、真っ直ぐ。徒歩5分。
ホテルの前にカフェがあり、すこし歩けば日本料理屋、海鮮レストラン、ベジタリアンレストランがあります。
【設備】
1階にバー、最上階にプール、あとフィットネスジムやサウナもあります。
部屋にはテレビ、湯沸かし器、冷蔵庫、セーフティボックス有り。
【サービス】
スタッフがどこにでも多めに配置されています。
スタッフは全体的に若くカジュアルな感じですが、よくトレーニングされているようで、しっかりと迅速に対応してくれます。
朝9時すぎに到着したのですが、空き部屋があったので、追加料金なしで即チェックインさせてくれました。
title: 日本領事館まで徒歩5分

text: Vicino alla stazione Gubeng, pulito, con una ricca colazione sebbene molto indonesian style e poco dolce e uno staff professionale e amichevole. Soluzione assolutamente raccomandata per un passaggio a Surabaya.
title: Buona sosta a Surabaya

text: Een nachtje ter overbrugging in Surabaya. Hotel ziet er op oog prima uit. Probeert een hip hotel te zijn wat niet helemaal lukt. Kamers zijn schoon, prima voor een nacht. Rooftop bar ziet er leuk uit. Zeer uitgebreid indonesisch ontbijt, westers ontbijt aan de karige kant. Hotel geeft een beetje een net niet gevoel maar voor een nacht prima om te verblijven,Surabaya geen fantastische stad.
title: Prima hotel voor een nachtje

text:
Au premier abord accueil assez froid, pas de welcome drink, dommage 
Nous avions réservé 2 nuits 1 mois auparavant, lors de notre arrivée, le personnel semblait dépassé et ne trouvait pas notre réservation, alors que je leur avait présenté mon voucher - il semblait y avoir un évènement au bar se situant devant l'accueil ?
Après 15 minutes, bingo ! réservation trouvée, enfin un sourire de leur part 

Nous arrivons dans notre chambre, très correcte, propre, literie impeccable
Tv, wifi, thé café, eau à discrétion .. 

La piscine est située dans l'espace bar au dernier étage fréquenté par beaucoup d'adolescents - Endroit bruyant et pas intime du tout pour se détendre....

L’hôtel par lui même est très correct, Personnel un peu froid, sans doute timide ou problème de communication ? 

Cependant un Grand Merci à la personne qui s'occupe des bagages, de la conciergerie, de l'ouverture des portes qui est très sympathique et dont le niveau d'anglais est bien au dessus de la moyenne du personnel de cet hôtel !
title: Correct

text: 一家三口入住了两晚，8岁女儿也许旅途劳累发烧了，酒店员工先是提供免费的退烧贴，后来又应我们要求主动陪同前去医院就诊（医院就在酒店的对角路口，非常方便），值得让人信任他们的真诚服务。

text:
Hier stimmt eigentlich alles: eine nette hilfsbereite Concierge beim Einchecken, netter Service von Doorboys und Zimmerpagen, tolles Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Die Zimmer sind ausreichend groß, in fröhlichen Farben minimalistisch eingerichtet. Das Bad hat eine große Dusche, allerdings das Waschbecken neben der Zimmertür. Ein bequemes Bett mit großartigem Blick durch die breite Fensterfront macht das Aufwachen angenehm. Wir haben einmal übernachtet, um dann zum Mount Bromo zu fahren. Am nächsten Tag kamen wir wieder, das Gepäck wurde für uns zwischengelagert und das Personal hat uns freundlich wiedererkannt. Beim Auschecken um 04.00 h morgens bekamen wir kleine Frühstücksboxen mit Sandwich bzw. fried rice mit auf den Weg. 

Tolles Frühstücksbuffet und aufmerksamer Service aller Mitarbeiter mit extravaganten Frisuren.

Kleine Minuspunkte: Das Wasser im open air-Jacuzzi im 11. Stock ist eindeutig zu kalt; das Personal im Restaurant am Abend interessierte sich mehr für das gezeigte Fussballspiel als für die wenigen vorhandenen Gäste.

Zimmertipp: in den oberen Etagen hat man eine gute Sicht auf die Stadt, wir hatten Nummer 810.
title: Eines der besseren Mid-Budget-Hotels

text:
Nous avons passé une nuit dans cet hôtel. Nous étions 4, nous avions donc deux chambres avec lits doubles.
Pour les deux chambres nous avons constaté : 2 bouteilles d'eau, deux tasses, deux serviettes mais une seule paire de pantoufles, une seule brosse à dents. Drap taché (auréoles jaunes sur le drap housse), poussière sur la tête de lit. Pas de sèche cheveux. Et, toujours pour les deux chambres : clim très bruyante. 
Petit déjeuner plus asiatique qu'occidental. Viennoiseries sèches. Café et jus moyens. Parties communes propres et modernes. Personnel accueillant et agréable.
title: Déception...
